scripts.lint:typed: pnpm run lint:typed:packages && pnpm run lint:typed:apps
scripts.lint:workspace: pnpm run lint:base && pnpm run lint:md && pnpm run lint:css && pnpm run typecheck
scripts.clean:xcode: find . -name '*.xcuserdata*' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true; find . -name 'xcuserdata' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true; find . -name '*.xcworkspace/xcuserdata' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:spotlight: find . -name '.Spotlight-V100' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true; find . -name '.fseventsd' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:temp: find . -name '*.tmp' -type f -delete 2>/dev/null || true; find . -name 'Thumbs.db' -type f -delete 2>/dev/null || true; find . -name '~*' -type f -delete 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:all: pnpm run clean:temp && pnpm run clean
scripts.tokens:sync: pnpm run tokens:orchestrate && pnpm --filter design-tokens tokens:sync
scripts.tokens:validate: pnpm run tokens:orchestrate -- --validate-only && node -e "const { runTokenContractValidation } = require('./packages/shared-utils/dist/token-contract-validation.js'); runTokenContractValidation();"
scripts.tokens:check-drift: echo 'üîç Checking for token drift...' && echo 'Drift check placeholder - would compare with Penpot'
scripts.tokens:diff: echo 'üìä Token diff placeholder - would show changes between versions'
scripts.tokens:monitor: echo 'üëÄ Token monitoring placeholder - would start continuous monitoring'
scripts.tokens:cli:help: echo 'üìã Run n00plicate-token-cli without installing globally: pnpm dlx n00plicate-token-cli'
scripts.tokens:cli:status: echo 'üìã Use: n00plicate-tokens status (run with: pnpm dlx n00plicate-token-cli)'
scripts.validate:penpot-export: node -e "console.log('üîç Validating Penpot export...'); if (!require('fs').existsSync('tokens.json')) { console.log('‚ùå tokens.json not found'); process.exit(1); } console.log('‚úÖ Penpot export validated');"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n tokens,storybook,web 'pnpm tokens:watch' 'pnpm storybook' 'pnpm --filter web serve'
